str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.
A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Who, which, what, why. Probably emphatic of tis; an interrogative pronoun, who, which or what.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From kata and histemi; to place down, i.e. to designate, constitute, convoy.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
A judge, magistrate, ruler. From krino; a judge.
Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.
A divider, partitioner, distributor. From merizo; an apportioner.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
